misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his dedication to the sport and his distinctive presence on the course. Representing Kurk Golf, Marcus approaches each tournament with a unique blend of intensity and thoughtfulness, carefully plotting each shot and strategy.

Off the course, Marcus is known to be a very private and reflective person. A lesser-known fact about Marcus is that he occasionally participates in golf events under the guise of his female alter-ego, 'Eva', as he privately struggles with his gender identity.

Having participated in all eleven previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Marcus is still searching for his first victory at the event. Despite not having secured a Hector Trophée victory yet, Marcus's consistent participation underscores his enduring commitment to the tournament, and he is expected to participate again in Hector Trophée 2025.

While the coveted Hector Trophée title has remained elusive thus far, Marcus continues to pursue excellence on the course, driven by a deep-seated love for the game and a desire to leave a lasting mark on the sport.
